name: Easy Free Popup
author: Józef Curyłło

sections.description: Free customizable popup with basic functionality. Supports Facebook, Instagram, Twitter, YouTube, LinkedIn and Snapchat. You can also put your own code. The plugin is SEO friendly.
sections.installation:
1. Upload the plugin files to the /wp-content/plugins/easy-free-popup directory, or install the plugin through the WordPress plugins screen directly.
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ screen in WordPress
  3. Use the Settings->Easy Free Popup screen to configure the plugin
  4. For testing purposes it can be helpful to remove cookie “efp_modal_cookie” after requests
sections.faq:
When I paste HTML+JS code to the “content” input I obtain warning message from firewall

Dismiss this message.

How can I debug this popup?

In this version the best idea to debug is to remove cookie “efp_modal_cookie” after each request
sections.changelog:
0.1

  • First version of this plugin. Basic functionality

short_description: Free customizable popup plugin with basic functionality. Supports Facebook, Instagram, Twitter etc. SEO friendly.
